contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Galaxy | image = [[Image:NGC5078.jpg|250px|]] | name = [[New General Catalogue|NGC]] 5078 | epoch = [[J2000]] | type = SA(s)a<ref name="ned">{{cite web | title=NASA/IPAC Extragalactic Database | work=Results for NGC 5078 | url=http://nedwww.ipac.caltech.edu/ | accessdate=2006-11-18 }}</ref> | ra = {{RA|13|19|50.0}}<ref name="ned" /> | dec = {{DEC|-27|24|36}}<ref name="ned" /> | dist_ly = 94 [[light-year|Mly]]{{Fact|date=February 2007}} | z = 2168 Â± 6 km/[[second|s]]<ref name="ned" /> | appmag_v = +11.8<ref name="ned" /> | size_v = 4′.0 × 1′.9<ref name="ned" /> | constellation name = [[Hydra (constellation)|Hydra]] | notes = | names = [[Principal Galaxies Catalogue|PGC]] 46490<ref name="ned" /> }} '''NGC 5078''' is a [[spiral galaxy]] in the [[Hydra (constellation)|Hydra]] [[constellation]]. It is similar in structure to [[NGC 5746]]. NGC 5078 is at an estimated 94 million [[light-year]]s away from [[Earth]]. ==References== {{reflist}} {{Ngc55}} [[Category:Spiral galaxies]] [[Category:Hydra (constellation)]] [[Category:NGC objects|5078]] [[Category:PGC objects|46490]] {{galaxy-stub}}
